content: Backend: Add deliverables API endpoints (add, list, delete deliverables for projects)
Backend: Install reportlab and add PDF invoice generation endpoint
Backend: Update Project model to include deliverables array
Frontend: Create ProjectDetail page with deliverables management UI
Frontend: Create InvoiceDetail page with PDF download button
Frontend: Add routing for all detail pages (/projects/:id, /clients/:id, /invoices/:id, /payments/:id)
Frontend: Update view buttons to navigate to detail pages instead of opening dialogs
Test PDF invoice generation and download
Test all detail pages navigation and display
